Tomato___Late_blight: Late blight on tomato: remove infected leaves immediately, avoid overhead watering, and apply a fungicide containing chlorothalonil or copper according to label instructions. Improve air circulation and rotate crops next season.
Tomato___Early_blight: Early blight on tomato: remove heavily infected leaves, apply a contact fungicide at first symptom, and ensure balanced potassium fertilization to improve resilience.
